name: Protective Polish
desc: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Punishing Draw
desc: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Bow Charge Plus
desc: Increases max bow charge level by one.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Good Luck
desc: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Critical Status
desc: Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Razor Sharp/Spare Shot
desc: Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Nullify Wind Pressure
desc: Negates all wind pressure.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Master's Touch
desc: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Guts
desc: Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Guard Up
desc: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Capture Master
desc: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Non-elemental Boost
desc: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Bludgeoner
desc: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Mind's Eye/Ballistics
desc: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Critical Element
desc: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Stamina Cap Up
desc: Increases stamina cap.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Adrenaline
desc: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Poison Duration Up
desc: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Super Recovery
desc: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Hasten Recovery
desc: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.This skill can only be obtained by equipping certain pieces of armor.

name: Intimidator
desc: Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. (No effect on certain monsters.)

effects.desc: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

name: Affinity Sliding
desc: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

effects.desc: Increases affinity by 30% for a short time after sliding.

name: Tool Specialist
desc: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.

name: BBQ Master
desc: Improves your skill at cooking meat.

effects.desc: Makes it easier to cook well-done steaks.

name: Detector
desc: Shows rare gathering points on the Wildlife Map.

effects.desc: Marks rare sites on the wildlife map.

name: Forager's Luck
desc: Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.

effects.desc: Increases the likelihood of rare gathering points respawning.

name: Scenthound
desc: Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.

name: Effluvia Resistance
desc: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.

name: Entomologist
desc: Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters, allowing them to be carved.

effects.desc: Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Makes it so corpses will always be left behind.

name: Scholar
desc: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations. (Effect is applied at the quest results screen.)

effects.desc: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations.

name: Blindsider
desc: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

effects.desc: Increases the success rate of flash effects.

name: Cliffhanger
desc: Decreases stamina depletion when evading while clinging to walls or ivy.

effects.desc: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 25%.

name: Aquatic Expert
desc: Improves mobility in water.

effects.desc: Prevents water from slowing movement and improves evasion while in water.
Prevents water from slowing movement and greatly improves evasion while in water.

name: Sporepuff Expert
desc: Recover health when using sporepuffs.

name: Jump Master
desc: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

name: Speed Crawler
desc: Increases movement speed while crouching.

name: Scoutfly Range Up
desc: Expands your scoutflies' detection range.

name: Flinch Free
desc: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

effects.desc: Prevents standard knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

name: Stealth
desc: Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

effects.desc: Makes it slightly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it moderately easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it much easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

name: Slinger Capacity
desc: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo obtained in the field.

effects.desc: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for some slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo dropped by monsters.

name: Maximum Might
desc: Increases affinity when stamina is full.

name: Geologist
desc: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.

effects.desc: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles and special item gathering points.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles, gathering points, and mining outcrops.

name: Botanist
desc: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

effects.desc: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect or mushroom item per gather.

name: Palico Rally
desc: Powers up Palicoes.

effects.desc: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

name: Divine Blessing
desc: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.

effects.desc: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

name: Carving Pro
desc: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.

name: Honey Hunter
desc: Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.

name: Master Gatherer
desc: Allows you to gather more quickly, and also prevents attacks from knocking you back while gathering.

effects.desc: Speeds up gathering and prevents knockbacks while gathering.

name: Pro Transporter
desc: Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them.

effects.desc: Increases movement speed while transporting and reduces downtime on landings.

name: Master Fisher
desc: Improves your skill at fishing.

effects.desc: Increases the time window for reeling in fish, and makes it easier to catch large fish.

name: Mushroomancer
desc: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

effects.desc: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.

name: Bombardier
desc: Increases the damage of explosive items.

name: Speed Sharpening
desc: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

effects.desc: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

name: Speed Eating
desc: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

name: Free Meal
desc: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

name: Item Prolonger
desc: Extends the duration of some item effects.

name: Wide-Range
desc: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

effects.desc: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with full efficacy.

name: Quick Sheath
desc: Speeds up weapon sheathing.

name: Guard
desc: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

effects.desc: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 15%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 30%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Evade Extender
desc: Increases evade distance.

name: Evade Window
desc: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

name: Hunger Resistance
desc: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

effects.desc: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 30%.
Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 60%.
Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

name: Stamina Surge
desc: Speeds up stamina recovery.

name: Leap of Faith
desc: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.

name: Constitution
desc: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.

name: Marathon Runner
desc: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

name: Heavy Artillery
desc: Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.

name: Artillery
desc: Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.

effects.desc: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

name: Special Ammo Boost
desc: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.

effects.desc: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

name: Capacity Boost
desc: Increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

name: Horn Maestro
desc: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

effects.desc: Extends melody effect duration and increases health recovery.

name: Resuscitate
desc: Improves evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.

effects.desc: While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time and reduces stamina depletion.

name: Resentment
desc: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).

name: Fortify
desc: Increases your attack and defense every time you fall in battle. (This effect can stack twice.)

effects.desc: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

name: Heroics
desc: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

effects.desc: While active, increases attack power by 5% and increases defense by 15 points.
While active, increases attack power by 10% and increases defense by 20 points.
While active, increases attack power by 15% and increases defense by 25 points.
While active, increases attack power by 20% and increases defense by 30 points.
While active, increases attack power by 30% and increases defense by 40 points.

name: Peak Performance
desc: Increases attack when your health is full.

name: Agitator
desc: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

effects.desc: While active, grants attack +4 and increases affinity by 3%.
While active, grants attack +8 and increases affinity by 6%.
While active, grants attack +12 and increases affinity by 9%.
While active, grants attack +16 and increases affinity by 12%.
While active, grants attack +20 and increases affinity by 15%.

name: Latent Power
desc: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

effects.desc: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Airborne
desc: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.

name: Master Mounter
desc: Makes it easier to mount monsters.

effects.desc: Makes it easier to mount monsters and down mounted monsters.

name: Stamina Thief
desc: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

name: Slugger
desc: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

name: Partbreaker
desc: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.

name: Critical Draw
desc: Increases affinity when performing draw attacks.

name: Handicraft
desc: Extends the weapon sharpness gauage. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

name: Power Prolonger
desc: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.

name: Focus
desc: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

effects.desc: Increases gauge fill rate by 5% and reduces charge times by 5%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 10% and reduces charge times by 10%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 20% and reduces charge times by 20%.

name: Weakness Exploit
desc: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.

effects.desc: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

name: Critical Boost
desc: Increases the damage of critical hits.

effects.desc: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 30%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 35%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 40%.

name: Critical Eye
desc: Increases affinity.

name: Free Elem/Ammo Up
desc: Unlocks your weapon's hidden element. Also increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)

effects.desc: Draws out 33% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
Draws out 66% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
Draws out 100% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.

name: Spread/Power Shots
desc: Increases the attack power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

effects.desc: Increases the power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

name: Piercing Shots
desc: Increases the attack power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

effects.desc: Increases the power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

name: Normal Shots
desc: Increases the attack power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

effects.desc: Increases the power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

name: Blast Attack
desc: Increases the rate of the blast buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

name: Sleep Attack
desc: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Elemental buildup has maximum limit.)

name: Paralysis Attack
desc: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

name: Poison Attack
desc: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

name: Dragon Attack
desc: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Thunder Attack
desc: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Ice Attack
desc: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has as maximum limit.)

name: Water Attack
desc: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Fire Attack
desc: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Blight Resistance
desc: Grants protection against all elemental blights.

effects.desc: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 30%.
Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 60%.

name: Dragon Resistance
desc: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Thunder Resistance
desc: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Ice Resistance
desc: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Water Resistance
desc: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Fire Resistance
desc: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Recovery Speed
desc: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).

effects.desc: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

name: Recovery Up
desc: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

name: Health Boost
desc: Increases health.

name: Defense Boost
desc: Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.

name: Attack Boost
desc: Increases attack power. Also improves affinity at higher levels.

name: Heat Guard
desc: Nullifies damage from heat.

name: Effluvial Expert
desc: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.

effects.desc: Nullifies damage from effluvia and reduces damage from acids.

name: Dungmaster
desc: Makes monsters hit with slinger dung pods more likely to run.

effects.desc: Makes slinger dung pods more effective at making monsters run away.

name: Tremor Resistance
desc: Grants protection against ground tremors.

effects.desc: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

name: Windproof
desc: Grants protection against wind pressure.

effects.desc: Slightly reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
Reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
Negates minor wind pressure and reduces the effects of major wind pressure.
Negates minor and major wind pressure.

name: Earplugs
desc: Grants protection form large monsters' roars.

effects.desc: Slightly reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

name: Iron Skin
desc: Grants protection against Defense Down.

effects.desc: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 30%.
Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 60%.

name: Bleeding Resistance
desc: Grants protection against bleeding.

name: Blast Resistance
desc: Grants protection against blastblight.

effects.desc: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

name: Muck Resistance
desc: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.

effects.desc: Reduces limits on movement speed and evasion.

name: Stun Resistance
desc: Reduces stun duration.

effects.desc: Reduces the duration of stun by 30%.
Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.

name: Sleep Resistance
desc: Reduces the duration of sleep.

effects.desc: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

name: Paralysis Resistance
desc: Reduces the duration of paralysis.

effects.desc: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

name: Poison Resistance
desc: Grants protection against the effects of poison.

effects.desc: Reduces the duration of poison by 30%.
Reduces the duration of poison by 60%.
